# RFA Wave Emperor

'RFA Wave Emperor ' (A 100) was a Wave-class oiler of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary built at Haverton Hill by the Furness Shipbuilding Company.
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20070621174940/http://www.btinternet.com/~warship/Postwar/RFA/wave.htm Wave Class Oilers] - website on Oilers by Jeremy Olver.
